description: We believe that education changes lives. This $1000 award is provided to help passionate students from underrepresented communities achieve their college dreams.
TechWomen is committed to supporting women in STEM by offering scholarships that open doors for future innovation and equity.
Empowering young leaders to impact the world through education. We fund students passionate about social impact and global justice.
This scholarship supports environmentally conscious students who want to create a more sustainable planet through innovation and education.
We support students entering the tech field who show great promise and need financial help to succeed in coding and software development.
Designed to help young creatives afford art school and grow their craft, this award celebrates expression through design and visual storytelling.
The healthcare system depends on compassionate, skilled professionals. This scholarship supports future nurses who are ready to serve and heal.
Created for student entrepreneurs and business majors who show leadership potential and a drive to innovate in the world of commerce.
Encouraging students in scientific research, this scholarship supports those who aim to discover, explore, and solve real-world problems.
This award helps students studying philosophy, literature, and history who believe in the power of ideas to transform the world.
